extension.description: Felvs Wizard allows you to get access to the latest Custom Builds.
Receive Important Kobra news and update notifications.
extension.disclaimer: We take no responsibility for any problems this plugin might in any way, form, shape or size cause.

extension.description: Subatomic Duck Wizard allows you to get access to the latest Subatomic Duck Custom Builds.

[COLOR red][B][I]KOBRA[/I][/COLOR][COLOR grey] WIZARDS SLEEVE[/B][/COLOR]. Here you will find some of the most popular wizards all in one place. If you would like your wizard adding please get it touch via our Facebook group. [COLOR dodgerblue]https://www.facebook.com/groups/KodiCustomBuilds/[/COLOR]
[COLOR red][B][I]KOBRA[/I][/B][/COLOR][COLOR grey] [B]TUBE[/B][/COLOR]is the official YouTube channel for Kobra Builds. Here you can find tutorials and preview videos.

[COLOR red][B][I]KOBRA[/I][/B][/COLOR][COLOR grey] [B]WIZARD[/B][/COLOR] provides easy access to [I]Kobra[/I] builds at the click of a button. The wizard also provides [I]Kobra[/I] custom packs to enable the user to customize the build to their own taste. [I]Kobra[/I] App Installer and [I]Kobra[/I] Tube are also included with the [I]Kobra[/I] Wizard. No addons are distributed with [I]Kobra[/I] builds. You will be asked if you would like to download each addons as you click on main menu and sub menu items. Thanks to all Devs who have contributed to this project!

[COLOR red][B][I]KOBRA[/I][/B][/COLOR][COLOR grey] [B]APP INSTALLER[/B][/COLOR]. Browse through the most popular Android apps on the market and install them with ease from within Kodi. The author of this addon takes no responsibilty for any content viewed via these applications or any damage caused by use of of these applications. Big thanks to ][NT3L][G3NC][.
